channel.title: MerlinScape - HD 508!
channel.description:
[center]
[img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/logo.png[/img] [size=24pt][b]508 HD Server[/b][/size]
[size=14pt]Introduction[/size] I have been coding for about 2 years, but have never made anything really amazing from my experience. I am using DemonWars Client and Server to make an amazing HD 508 server. Though I have added so much since, like 100% trading, agility, crafting god wars etc. I am hoping to get somewhere for the first time, since I began programming runescape private severs!
[size=14pt]Some Media[/size] [img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/screenshot1.png[/img] [img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/screenshot2.png[/img] [img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/screenshot3.png[/img] [img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/screenshot4.png[/img] [img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/screenshot5.png[/img] [img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/screenshot6.png[/img] [img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/screenshot7.png[/img] [img]http://camelot.net76.net/images/screens/screenshot8.png[/img]
[size=14pt]What we have so far?[/size] 1. 100% Agility 2. 100% Trading 3. 100% Crafting 4. Working Donator Zone and Shop 5. Staff Zone with Staff Items (Staff Armour) 6. Custom Objects and new items 7. 64-bit Windows and Mac Cache and Loading Problem 8. Fixed Interfaces that looked messed up 9. Added a bunch of commands for staff and normal players 10. HD Fullscreen compatible client 11. 99% Shops 12. 100% Clan Wars 13. 95% Castle Wars 14. Summoning Skill works 100% now 15. Better PVP (Now Works on HD & LD) 16. 19 Shops 17. Added 123 NPC (total of 342) 18. Lots of Commands (::starter, ::gwd, ::home, ::master, ::interface #) 19. Bunch of shops at home place 20. Better NPC vs. NPC system (Removed all NPC that fight eachother) 21. 2 Prayer Books Added 22. NPC Multi Barrage works 100% 23. Torva at HD Client 24. MAX HP has been raised to 999999999
[b]Skills:[/b] Crafting Works 100% NOW! Magic is 85% (don't know if I am going to complete it...) Ranged is NOW 100% Construction is 10% (I don't feel like finishing it...) Firemaking, Attack, Defence, strength, and all other skills are 100%
[size=14pt]So far we have:[/size] DemonWars as Server Developer TehJamDude (ME) as Server and Website Developer Master CoderZ as Server and Client Developer Zach (202685) as Website Developer
[size=14pt]Supporters[/size] DemonWars Tinyscape runewings317 kingman002 Daginith
[b]Releasing Tonight...[/b] [/center]

item.title: MerlinScape - HD 508!
item.dc:creator: @tehjamdude tehjamdude
item.description:
@tehjamdude wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:11, topic:440918”]Haven’t seen anyone make a 508 in a while. Good luck.
/support.[/quote]

Thank you, added you to the support list!

I will either release tonight or tomorrow morning!! I’m getting bored of it

Read full topic

item.description:
@DemonWars wrote:

[quote=“tinyscape, post:6, topic:440918”][quote author=tehjamdude link=topic=543596.msg3984389#msg3984389 date=1335710793]
Can I add you under support?
[/quote]Yes

[quote author=Fridder link=topic=543596.msg3984397#msg3984397 date=1335711135]
Looks great, is DemonWars’ client really HD? I thought I tried it already and it wasn’t HD…
[/quote]Its always been in HD.[/quote]

thank you for all of your support.
and my v1 release was in LD
but my v2 was in HD
i will be posting a new topic to the downloads section
Greetz demonWars

item.description:
@tehjamdude wrote:

runewings317:

Good luck! I would use this but I prefer more poorly coded servers so I can fix them up. Support!

Haha… Well DemonWars Client was only about 80% done everything

tinyscape:

I support since 508 is the best. Good to see that they are finally coming back ;D

Thanks, I have been seeing a lot of 508’s out recently
Can I add you under support?

item.title: MerlinScape - HD 508!
item.dc:creator: @tehjamdude tehjamdude
item.description:
@tehjamdude wrote:

[center]


[size=24pt]508 HD Server[/size]

[size=14pt]Introduction[/size]
I have been coding for about 2 years, but have never made anything really amazing from my experience. I am using DemonWars Client and Server to make an amazing HD 508 server. Though I have added so much since, like 100% trading, agility, crafting god wars etc. I am hoping to get somewhere for the first time, since I began programming runescape private severs!

[size=14pt]Some Media[/size]







[size=14pt]What we have so far?[/size]

  1. 100% Agility
  2. 100% Trading
  3. 100% Crafting
  4. Working Donator Zone and Shop
  5. Staff Zone with Staff Items (Staff Armour)
  6. Custom Objects and new items
  7. 64-bit Windows and Mac Cache and Loading Problem
  8. Fixed Interfaces that looked messed up
  9. Added a bunch of commands for staff and normal players
  10. HD Fullscreen compatible client
  11. 99% Shops
  12. 100% Clan Wars
  13. 95% Castle Wars
  14. Summoning Skill works 100% now
  15. Better PVP (Now Works on HD & LD)
  16. 19 Shops
  17. Added 123 NPC (total of 342)
  18. Lots of Commands (::starter, ::gwd, ::home, ::master, ::interface #)
  19. Bunch of shops at home place
  20. Better NPC vs. NPC system (Removed all NPC that fight eachother)
  21. 2 Prayer Books Added
  22. NPC Multi Barrage works 100%
  23. Torva at HD Client
  24. MAX HP has been raised to 999999999

Skills:
Crafting Works 100% NOW!
Magic is 85% (don’t know if I am going to complete it…)
Ranged is NOW 100%
Construction is 10% (I don’t feel like finishing it…)
Firemaking, Attack, Defence, strength, and all other skills are 100%

[size=14pt]So far we have:[/size]
DemonWars as Server Developer
TehJamDude (ME) as Server and Website Developer
Master CoderZ as Server and Client Developer
Zach (202685) as Website Developer

[size=14pt]Supporters[/size]
DemonWars
Tinyscape
runewings317
kingman002
Daginith

Releasing Tonight…
[/center]

Read full topic
